Package it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions

  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    AlreadyActivatedLeaderCardException
    Exception class thrown when the player tries to activate a leader card already activated.
    AlreadyDiscardedLeaderCardException
    Exception class thrown when the user tries to activate or discard a leader card already discarded
    BadInputFormatException
    Exception class thrown when the player's input doesn't satisfy integrity parameters.
    EmptyDeckException
    Exception class thrown when a development cards deck is empty
    EmptySlotException
    Exception class thrown when the player tries to buy a development card deck with no cards
    IllegalInsertionException
    Exception class thrown when an insertion performed by the player is not allowed
    IllegalMoveException
    Exception class thrown when the user tries to perform a move in warehouse not allowed
    InsufficientResourcesException
    Exception class thrown when the player doesn't have resources needed to activate or buy a specified object.
    MaxPlayersException
    Exception class thrown when players in multiplayer game are more than four
    PlayerNotExistsException
    Exception class thrown when the multiplayer game has reached more than four players.
    StorageOutOfBoundsException
    Exception class thrown when the specified storage's index is out of bounds.
    WrongCardTypeException
    Exception class thrown when the leader card method invoked on a card is of a different card type
